attributes.action: Bring in free Telephone line rental, for Pensioners.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that the Goverment should introduce an exemption where by pensioners are free from paying a line rental charge in order to have a land line telephone.When you consider that even if there are no calls made, a substantial amount of money in line rental, still has to be paid just to have this essential and vital form of communication at their disposal.
